original_text: The following came up from the towns of Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon and Immer, but they could not show that their families were descended from Israel:
korean_text: 델멜라와 델하르사와 그룹과 앗돈과 임멜로부터 올라온 자가 있으나 그들의 종족이나 계보가 이스라엘에 속하였는지는 증거할 수 없으니

sentences.original_text: The following came up from the towns
of Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon and Immer
sentences.korean_translation: 텔 멜라, 텔 하르사, 그룹, 앗돈과 임멜에서

sentences.original_text: that their families were descended from Israel
